description: F I G U R E 2 Location of Barathronus roulei on Porcupine Bank (red triangle). Also shown is the location of records of Atlantic Barathronus species (GBIF. org, 2023; OBIS, 2023).
name: F I G U R E 2 in Second world record for Barathronus roulei Nielsen, 2019 (Ophidiiformes, Bythitidae), from the Porcupine Bank (Northeast Atlantic)
